Mario's Tennis (Japan, USA).name: 馬里奧的網球
Mario's Tennis (Japan, USA).original_desc: Mario's Tennis Tennis is a game released in 1995 on Virtual Boy. Seven characters from the Mario universe are present: Mario, Luigi, Toad, Peach, Koopa, Yoshi and Donkey Kong Jr. playing only on one short pipe surrounded by a landscape.
Mario's Tennis (Japan, USA).desc: 《馬里奧網球》是一款於 1995 年在 Virtual Boy 上發布的遊戲。來自《馬里奧》宇宙的七個角色：馬里奧、路易吉、蟾蜍、桃子、庫帕、耀西和小金剛，只在風景環繞的一根短管上演奏。

Space Pinball (Unknown) (Proto).name: 銀河彈球
Space Pinball (Unknown) (Proto).original_desc: Galactic Pinball is a pinball video game released in 1995 on Virtual Boy. In addition to the high scores, you can choose between four pinball tables. These are named Alien, UFO, Colony and cosmic.
Space Pinball (Unknown) (Proto).desc: 銀河彈球是一款彈球視頻遊戲，於 1995 年在 Virtual Boy 上發布。除了高分之外，您還可以在四個彈球桌之間進行選擇。這些被命名為外星人、不明飛行物、殖民地和宇宙。

3-D Tetris (USA).name: 3D俄罗斯方块
3-D Tetris (USA).original_desc: 3D Tetris is a 3D Tetris game on Virtual Boy with 3 modes. The first contains five layers of Tetris blocks. Each time you complete a layer the blocks fall, disappear and you'll be rewarded with points. In the second, you place the blocks around the center of a well, the aim being to make them disappear. In the third mode, a form will be posted before the start of the match. You will have to reproduce that form perfectly.
3-D Tetris (USA).desc: 3D Tetris 是 Virtual Boy 上的一款 3D Tetris 遊戲，具有 3 種模式。第一層包含五層俄羅斯方塊。每完成一層，方塊就會掉落、消失，您將獲得積分獎勵。在第二個中，你將方塊放置在井的中心周圍，目的是讓它們消失。在第三種模式中，比賽開始前將發布表格。您必須完美地複制該表格。

Bound High (Unknown) (Proto).name: 高位約束
Bound High (Unknown) (Proto).original_desc: Bound High is one of the games that could have saved the Virtualboy if the console had been relaunched. The game was postponed several times and finally cancelled due to the lack of success of the console, despite having been completed. Chalvo, the bouncing robot, tracks down alien invaders, who threaten the peace of the inhabitants of Earth, in 3D levels located in space - above Earth or in similar universes.
Bound High (Unknown) (Proto).desc: 如果遊戲機重新推出，《Bound High》是可以拯救 Virtualboy 的遊戲之一。儘管遊戲已經完成，但由於主機的不成功，該遊戲被推遲了幾次並最終被取消。彈跳機器人 Chalvo 在位於地球上方或類似宇宙的 3D 空間中追踪威脅地球居民和平的外星入侵者。

Galactic Pinball (Japan, USA).name: 銀河彈球
Galactic Pinball (Japan, USA).original_desc: Galactic Pinball is a pinball video game released in 1995 on Virtual Boy. In addition to the high scores, you can choose between four pinball tables. These are named Alien, UFO, Colony and cosmic.
Galactic Pinball (Japan, USA).desc: 銀河彈球是一款彈球視頻遊戲，於 1995 年在 Virtual Boy 上發布。除了高分之外，您還可以在四個彈球桌之間進行選擇。這些被命名為外星人、不明飛行物、殖民地和宇宙。

Golf (USA).name: T&E虚拟高尔夫
Golf (USA).original_desc: Golf is a golf video game released in 1995 on Virtual Boy. Golf comes in a 3D perspective and contains two modes "tournament" and "bear play" as well as 18 holes during the course.
Golf (USA).desc: Golf 是一款高爾夫視頻遊戲，於 1995 年在 Virtual Boy 上發布。高爾夫採用3D視角，包含“錦標賽”和“熊賽”兩種模式以及18洞球場。

Innsmouth no Yakata (Japan).name: Nsmth n Yaqt
Innsmouth no Yakata (Japan).original_desc:
Deep within the pitch-black forest of the dead lies a terrible secret, a mansion filled with horrendous monsters called the Innsmouth Mansion! Once someone enters, they will have to escape from each floor before it's too late. However, no matter how many monsters you go through, you won't be able to run from Innsmouth's evil clutches so easily. Will you be able to escape the horrifying monsters of Innsmouth and reach safety? 
 
Everything is up to you.
Innsmouth no Yakata (Japan).desc:
在漆黑的死亡森林深處，隱藏著一個可怕的秘密，一座充滿可怕怪物的宅邸，名為印斯茅斯宅邸！一旦有人進入，他們就必須逃離每一層樓，以免為時已晚。然而，無論你遇到多少怪物，你都無法輕易逃離印斯茅斯的邪惡魔掌。你能逃離印斯茅斯可怕的怪物並到達安全地帶嗎？

一切都取決於你。

Jack Bros.original_name: Jack Bros. no Meiro de Hiihoo! (Japan)
Jack Bros.name: 傑克兄弟在 Hii Hoo 中間！
Jack Bros.original_desc: Jack Bros., is an adventure video game released in 1995 on Virtual Boy. Once a year, at Halloween, the door between our country and the fairies opens. All fairy should return to Fairieland 23:00, otherwise, they will be banished forever. You must choose one of three Jack Bros. as your character. Each has its own attributes and weapons and special attacks.
Jack Bros.desc: Jack Bros. 是一款冒險視頻遊戲，於 1995 年在 Virtual Boy 上發布。每年一次的萬聖節，我們國家和仙女之間的大門打開了。所有仙女必須在23:00返回仙境，否則將被永遠放逐。您必須從三個傑克兄弟中選擇一個作為您的角色。每個都有自己的屬性、武器和特殊攻擊。

Mario Clash (Japan, USA).name: 馬里奧衝突
Mario Clash (Japan, USA).original_desc: Mario Clash is a game of out platforms on Virtual Boy. The player incarnates Mario. The Clash House Tower was invaded by monsters. This is Mario entrusted to the task of evacuating them. But the tower is difficult to access and Mario is forced to fight in large rooms consist of long platforms, and in the tubing.
Mario Clash (Japan, USA).desc: 《馬里奧衝突》是 Virtual Boy 上的一款非平台遊戲。玩家化身馬里奧。衝突之家塔被怪物入侵。這是馬里奧受託的任務是疏散他們。但塔樓很難進入，馬里奧被迫在由長平台和管道組成的大房間裡戰鬥。

Nester's Funky Bowling (USA).name: 內斯特的時髦保齡球
Nester's Funky Bowling (USA).original_desc: Nester's Funky Bowling is a bowling game released in 1996 on Virtual Boy. Funky Bowling Nester is a classic bowling simulation. You can choose the mode Bowl game: if you want to play for points, in order to enroll in the high score list, Practical: if you just want to practice once, and the last challenge: if you want to play with predefined tasks.
Nester's Funky Bowling (USA).desc: Nester's Funky Bowling 是一款於 1996 年在 Virtual Boy 上發布的保齡球遊戲。Funky Bowling Nester 是一款經典的保齡球模擬遊戲。您可以選擇“碗遊戲”模式：如果您想玩積分，以便進入高分榜，“實用”：如果您只想練習一次，最後一個挑戰：如果您想玩預定義的任務。

Niko-chan Battle (Japan) (Proto).name: 陳尼可之戰
Niko-chan Battle (Japan) (Proto).original_desc:
Faceball was going to be one of the games to support the unreleased Virtual Boy GameLink cable. Like the Faceball games on other consoles (like Faceball 2000 on Game Boy and SNES), the Virtual Boy version could be described as an ego shooter with smiley balls. In a maze, which completely misses all unnecessary details and even textures, you have to hunt down and shoot all enemies in a certain time limit, which gets smaller from level to level. A radar in the upper right corner and a map of the maze, which you can be displayed by pressing Start, help you locate your foes. There's a total of 11 enemies called "Shot Me", "Ninja", "Death", "Stalker", "Invisible", "Bound", "Shieldman", "Ghost", "Hydra", "Wraith" and "Berserker". Each one is acting different, which requires different tactics. For example "Shieldman" hides behind an undestroyable shield, while "Berserker" runs into the player and knocks you off. You shouldn't let too often, though, because after only one death, the game is over and jumps back to the title screen. So the player should always keep an eye on a little Faceball in the bottom left corner, which tells about the remaining energy by the expression of its face. Bonus items which can be colected are bonus shields and speed-ups. Additionally, there are undestroyable glass wall, through which you can see, but not shoot enemies, which would have been a nice feature in multiplayer games. There are also destroyable walls, which are flashing. 
After each level you get points for your remaining time, as well as for the enemies you destroyed, depending on the kind of enemy.
Niko-chan Battle (Japan) (Proto).desc:
Faceball 將成為支持未發布的 Virtual Boy GameLink 電纜的遊戲之一。與其他遊戲機上的 Faceball 遊戲（如 Game Boy 和 SNES 上的 Faceball 2000）一樣，Virtual Boy 版本可以被描述為帶有笑臉球的自我射擊遊戲。在完全忽略所有不必要的細節甚至紋理的迷宮中，你必須在一定的時間限制內追捕並射擊所有敵人，隨著關卡的增加，時間限制會越來越小。右上角的雷達和迷宮地圖（按“開始”即可顯示）可幫助您找到敵人。共有 11 種敵人，分別為“射擊我”、“忍者”、“死亡”、“潛行者”、“隱形”、“束縛”、“盾牌人”、“幽靈”、“九頭蛇”、“幽靈”和“狂戰士”。每個人的行為都不同，這需要不同的策略。例如，“盾牌人”躲在不可摧毀的盾牌後面，而“狂戰士”則沖向玩家並將你擊倒。不過，你不應該經常這樣做，因為只有一次死亡後，遊戲就會結束並跳回標題屏幕。所以玩家應該時刻關注左下角的小臉球，它通過面部表情來告訴你剩餘的能量。可以收集的獎勵物品有獎勵護盾和加速。此外，還有不可摧毀的玻璃牆，通過它你可以看到敵人，但不能射擊敵人，這在多人遊戲中是一個很好的功能。還有可破壞的牆壁，它們正在閃爍。
每個級別結束後，您都會根據剩餘時間以及您消滅的敵人獲得積分，具體取決於敵人的類型。

Panic Bomber (USA).name: 恐慌轟炸機
Panic Bomber (USA).original_desc:
Bomberman Blasts the Island of Ever Mist! 
 
Get ready for explosive puzzler action with Bomberman! Detonate the worlds of Scary Ruins, Sinister Forest, and Desert Desolation. Conquer the Island of Ever Mist and capture the three celestial models of power. 
 
Don't panic! Or you might get scorched by greedy Ms. Flashy or the deadly Count Dracu-Doom. Ignite the dreaded Doom Castle with bombastic moves and combustive strategy. Only then can you open the gates to the legendary Golden Statue of Bomberman. It's a puzzling blast!
Panic Bomber (USA).desc:
炸彈人炸毀長霧島！

準備好與炸彈人一起進行爆炸性的解謎動作吧！引爆恐怖廢墟、險惡森林和沙漠荒涼的世界。征服永霧島並奪取三種力量的天體模型。

不要恐慌！或者你可能會被貪婪的浮華女士或致命的德拉庫·杜姆伯爵燒焦。用誇張的動作和燃燒的策略點燃可怕的末日城堡。只有這樣你才能打開傳說中的炸彈人金色雕像的大門。真是令人費解的爆炸！

Red Alarm (Japan).name: 紅色警報
Red Alarm (Japan).original_desc:
Bursting through incredible dimensions of Virtual space the final mission is clear. Obliterate all enemies and obstacles created by KAOS and terminate this menacing battle system from within.

Employing an impressive arsenal of high-tech weapons and evasive maneuvers the Tech-Wing Fighter speeds on. Spinning deaths, spy pods and mosquito mechs appear from everywhere! The fate of humanity will soon be defined. Red Alarm! Red Alarm! Alarm Condition Red!!
Red Alarm (Japan).desc:
突破虛擬空間的令人難以置信的維度，最終的任務是明確的。消滅 KAOS 製造的所有敵人和障礙，從內部終止這個來勢洶洶的戰鬥系統。

科技翼戰鬥機採用令人印象深刻的高科技武器庫和規避機動，加速前進。旋轉的死亡、間諜艙和蚊子機甲從各處出現！人類的命運很快就會被確定。紅色警報！紅色警報！警報狀態 紅色！ ！

Red Alarm (USA).name: 紅色警報
Red Alarm (USA).original_desc:
Bursting through incredible dimensions of Virtual space the final mission is clear. Obliterate all enemies and obstacles created by KAOS and terminate this menacing battle system from within.

Employing an impressive arsenal of high-tech weapons and evasive maneuvers the Tech-Wing Fighter speeds on. Spinning deaths, spy pods and mosquito mechs appear from everywhere! The fate of humanity will soon be defined. Red Alarm! Red Alarm! Alarm Condition Red!!
Red Alarm (USA).desc:
突破虛擬空間的令人難以置信的維度，最終的任務是明確的。消滅 KAOS 製造的所有敵人和障礙，從內部終止這個來勢洶洶的戰鬥系統。

科技翼戰鬥機採用令人印象深刻的高科技武器庫和規避機動，加速前進。旋轉的死亡、間諜艙和蚊子機甲從各處出現！人類的命運很快就會被確定。紅色警報！紅色警報！警報狀態 紅色！ ！

SD Gundam - Dimension War (Japan).name: SD高达Dimension War
SD Gundam - Dimension War (Japan).original_desc: Based on the popular mecha anime franchise, SD Gundam Dimension War is a turn-based strategy game where you are place in command of a small task force as you travel across the galaxy aiming to wipe out the opposing units you encounter. Gameplay is split in to two parts - a map screen where you manoeuvre your troops and a close up view for battles.
SD Gundam - Dimension War (Japan).desc: 《SD高達次元戰爭》以流行的機甲動漫系列為基礎，是一款回合製策略遊戲，您將指揮一支小型特遣部隊穿越銀河系，目標是消滅遇到的敵對單位。遊戲玩法分為兩部分 - 地圖屏幕（您可以在其中操縱部隊）和近距離戰鬥視圖。

Space Invaders - Virtual Collection (Jap.name: 太空侵略者 - 虛擬收藏
Space Invaders - Virtual Collection (Jap.original_desc: Attention all Earthlings! Relentless alien hordes have been identified near you. Prevent the dangerous Space Invaders from landing on your territory. Use your cannon to defend against waves of descending alien invaders. Don't let them hit the ground or it's all over for you and the Earth! Destroy them and score points!
Space Invaders - Virtual Collection (Jap.desc: 所有地球人注意了！在你附近發現了無情的外星部落。防止危險的太空入侵者登陸您的領土。使用你的大砲來防禦一波又一波的外星入侵者。不要讓它們撞到地面，否則你和地球就都完了！消滅他們並得分！

Space Squash (Japan).name: 太空壁球
Space Squash (Japan).original_desc: Space Squash is one of those games where the premise is so simple you could write it on the back of a postage stamp and still have room to spare. You guard one end of a tunnel and your opponent guards the other as you both float around smacking a spiked ball between one another. Get it past the opposition to score a point. First to three wins.
Space Squash (Japan).desc: 太空壁球是一款遊戲，其前提非常簡單，您可以將其寫在郵票背面，並且仍然有剩餘空間。你守衛隧道的一端，你的對手守衛另一端，你們都漂浮在彼此之間，互相敲擊一個帶刺的球。越過對手即可得分。第一到三勝。

T&E Virtual Golf (Japan).name: T&E虚拟高尔夫
T&E Virtual Golf (Japan).original_desc: Golf is a golf video game released in 1995 on Virtual Boy. Golf comes in a 3D perspective and contains two modes "tournament" and "bear play" as well as 18 holes during the course.
T&E Virtual Golf (Japan).desc: Golf 是一款高爾夫視頻遊戲，於 1995 年在 Virtual Boy 上發布。高爾夫採用3D視角，包含“錦標賽”和“熊賽”兩種模式以及18洞球場。

Teleroboxer (Japan, USA).name: 遠程拳擊手
Teleroboxer (Japan, USA).original_desc:
In a savage display of pounding moves and lightning action, robotic boxers from around the globe step into a futuristic ring. Mirroring the movements of the humans in control, each Teleroboxer is capable of surviving defense matches unbearable to mankind.

Slug it out to the staggering end to determine the true world champion. Created with specialized Techtronic powers and unique personalities, these responsive machines show no mercy on their way to the brutal top.
Teleroboxer (Japan, USA).desc:
在野蠻的重擊動作和閃電動作中，來自世界各地的機器人拳擊手步入了未來派的拳擊場。每個 Teleroboxer 都能夠模仿人類控制的動作，能夠在人類難以忍受的防禦比賽中倖存下來。

決鬥到底，決出真正的世界冠軍。這些反應靈敏的機器擁有專業的 Techtronic 能力和獨特的個性，在通往殘酷頂峰的道路上毫不留情。

Tobidase! Panibon (Japan).name: 跳出去！2帕
Tobidase! Panibon (Japan).original_desc:
Bomberman Blasts the Island of Ever Mist! 
 
Get ready for explosive puzzler action with Bomberman! Detonate the worlds of Scary Ruins, Sinister Forest, and Desert Desolation. Conquer the Island of Ever Mist and capture the three celestial models of power. 
 
Don't panic! Or you might get scorched by greedy Ms. Flashy or the deadly Count Dracu-Doom. Ignite the dreaded Doom Castle with bombastic moves and combustive strategy. Only then can you open the gates to the legendary Golden Statue of Bomberman. It's a puzzling blast!
Tobidase! Panibon (Japan).desc:
炸彈人炸毀長霧島！

準備好與炸彈人一起進行爆炸性的解謎動作吧！引爆恐怖廢墟、險惡森林和沙漠荒涼的世界。征服永霧島並奪取三種力量的天體模型。

不要恐慌！或者你可能會被貪婪的浮華女士或致命的德拉庫·杜姆伯爵燒焦。用誇張的動作和燃燒的策略點燃可怕的末日城堡。只有這樣你才能打開傳說中的炸彈人金色雕像的大門。真是令人費解的爆炸！

V-Tetris (Japan).name: V-俄羅斯方塊
V-Tetris (Japan).original_desc: V-Tetris is a Japanese-exclusive Tetris game for the Virtual Boy. It is not to be confused with the similar Virtual Boy title 3D Tetris, as the two games are entirely different. V-Tetris, unlike 3D Tetris, is mostly the same as the original Tetris games, the only difference being the cylindrical puzzle mode in which blocks could be placed in a 3-D spiral.
V-Tetris (Japan).desc: V-Tetris 是 Virtual Boy 的日本獨有的俄羅斯方塊遊戲。不要將它與類似的 Virtual Boy 遊戲 3D Tetris 混淆，因為這兩款遊戲完全不同。V-Tetris 與 3D Tetris 不同，與原始 Tetris 遊戲基本相同，唯一的區別是圓柱形拼圖模式，其中塊可以放置在 3D 螺旋中。

Vertical Force (Japan).name: 垂直力
Vertical Force (Japan).original_desc: The game takes place in "Space Era 210." The giant computer that takes care of a human colony planet named Odin suddenly malfunctions and decides to send an army of drone starfighters to destroy Earth. These drones emit a signal that renders all Earth starfighters useless. An archaeology team finds an ancient starfighter on the planet Ragnarok that is fortuitously impervious to the drones' signal. It is up to the player to command this starship and destroy all the alien drones.
Vertical Force (Japan).desc: 遊戲發生在“太空紀元210”。負責管理名為奧丁的人類殖民地星球的巨型計算機突然發生故障，並決定派出一支由無人機星際戰鬥機組成的軍隊來摧毀地球。這些無人機發出的信號使地球上所有的星際戰鬥機都變得毫無用處。考古隊在諸神黃昏星球上發現了一架古代星際戰鬥機，它碰巧不受無人機信號的影響。玩家需要指揮這艘星艦並摧毀所有外星無人機。

Vertical Force (USA).name: 垂直力
Vertical Force (USA).original_desc: The game takes place in "Space Era 210." The giant computer that takes care of a human colony planet named Odin suddenly malfunctions and decides to send an army of drone starfighters to destroy Earth. These drones emit a signal that renders all Earth starfighters useless. An archaeology team finds an ancient starfighter on the planet Ragnarok that is fortuitously impervious to the drones' signal. It is up to the player to command this starship and destroy all the alien drones.
Vertical Force (USA).desc: 遊戲發生在“太空紀元210”。負責管理名為奧丁的人類殖民地星球的巨型計算機突然發生故障，並決定派出一支由無人機星際戰鬥機組成的軍隊來摧毀地球。這些無人機發出的信號使地球上所有的星際戰鬥機都變得毫無用處。考古隊在諸神黃昏星球上發現了一架古代星際戰鬥機，它碰巧不受無人機信號的影響。玩家需要指揮這艘星艦並摧毀所有外星無人機。

Virtual Bowling (Japan).name: 虛擬保齡球
Virtual Bowling (Japan).original_desc: Virtual Bowling is a bowling game released in 1995 on the Virtual Boy. There are three game modes: "standard" mode, where you complete a simple set of 10 frames to get a high score, "Tournament" mode, and "training mode" where you can place the pins freely in any combination before each throw.
Virtual Bowling (Japan).desc: Virtual Bowling 是 1995 年在 Virtual Boy 上發布的一款保齡球遊戲。共有三種遊戲模式：“標準”模式，您完成一組簡單的 10 幀以獲得高分；“錦標賽”模式；以及“訓練模式”，您可以在每次投擲前以任意組合自由放置瓶。

Virtual Boy Wario Land (Japan, USA).name: 虛擬男孩瓦里奧樂園
Virtual Boy Wario Land (Japan, USA).original_desc: Yikes!!! Get ready for a devious treasure hunt with the infamous scheming Wario. Capture the shining gold and vast treasures locked deep inside a hidden cave. But, beware of poison ponds, perilous prisons, endless walls and creepy woods! Make a quick change into Sea Dragon Wario, Eagle Wario or Bull Wario and utilize their mighty strengths. Blow away enemy cave defenders with body attacks and power actions. Succeed in this greedy plot to seize the riches of this underground world and find this key to freedom!
Virtual Boy Wario Land (Japan, USA).desc: 哎呀！ ！ ！準備好與臭名昭著的詭計多端的瓦里奧一起進行狡猾的尋寶之旅。捕獲隱藏洞穴深處的閃亮黃金和大量寶藏。但是，要小心毒池、危險的監獄、無盡的牆壁和令人毛骨悚然的樹林！快速變身為海龍瓦里奧、鷹瓦里奧或公牛瓦里奧，發揮他們的強大力量。用身體攻擊和力量動作擊退敵人的洞穴防御者。成功地完成這個貪婪的陰謀，奪取這個地下世界的財富，並找到這把自由的鑰匙！

Virtual Fishing (Japan).name: 虛擬釣魚
Virtual Fishing (Japan).original_desc:
Virtual Fishing aims to replicate the fishing experience, pitting you against six opponents as you compete in several competitions. 
Upon starting the game you are presented with a 3D map screen with five locations on for you to compete at, as well as a training area where you can get used to the controls, which are pretty straightforward.
Virtual Fishing (Japan).desc:
虛擬釣魚旨在復制釣魚體驗，讓您在多項比賽中與六名對手競爭。
開始遊戲後，您會看到一個 3D 地圖屏幕，其中有五個位置供您競爭，還有一個訓練區域，您可以在其中習慣控制，這非常簡單。

Virtual Lab (Japan).name: 虛擬實驗室
Virtual Lab (Japan).original_desc: Virtual Lab is a puzzle game released in 1995 on Virtual Boy. The game is a cross between Tetris and Pipe Dream. Coins fall from the top of the screen and must be arranged to form completely closed tubes.
Virtual Lab (Japan).desc: Virtual Lab 是一款益智遊戲，於 1995 年在 Virtual Boy 上發布。該遊戲是俄羅斯方塊和白日夢的結合體。硬幣從屏幕頂部落下，必須排列成完全封閉的管子。

Virtual League Baseball (USA).name: Virtour P 公路棒球 '95
Virtual League Baseball (USA).original_desc: Hey batta batta swing! You're in the virtual big leagues now. Playing 18 teams from around the world. Throwing fast balls, forkballs, sinkers, sliders and changeups. Swinging for the fence, and laying down bunts. Shagging flies. Snagging drives. And tagging out runners. All in bigger-than-life 3D. With single game, all star and pennant race modes. And catch this: it's the only baseball game good enough to play in the virtual boy ball park. So don't drop the ball. Pick up a starting pitcher. Set your DH. And step up to the plate.
Virtual League Baseball (USA).desc: 嘿巴塔巴塔搖擺！您現在已加入虛擬大聯盟。與來自世界各地的 18 支球隊進行比賽。投擲快球、叉球、墜球、滑球和變速球。向柵欄揮桿，並打短打。操蒼蠅。阻礙驅動器。並給跑步者貼上標籤。一切盡在傳奇般的 3D 場景中。具有單場比賽、全明星賽和錦旗賽模式。請注意這一點：這是唯一一款足以在虛擬男孩棒球場上玩的棒球遊戲。所以不要丟球。挑選一名首發投手。設置你的DH。並走上盤子。

Virtual Pro Yakyuu '95 (Japan).name: Virtour P 公路棒球 '95
Virtual Pro Yakyuu '95 (Japan).original_desc: Hey batta batta swing! You're in the virtual big leagues now. Playing 18 teams from around the world. Throwing fast balls, forkballs, sinkers, sliders and changeups. Swinging for the fence, and laying down bunts. Shagging flies. Snagging drives. And tagging out runners. All in bigger-than-life 3D. With single game, all star and pennant race modes. And catch this: it's the only baseball game good enough to play in the virtual boy ball park. So don't drop the ball. Pick up a starting pitcher. Set your DH. And step up to the plate.
Virtual Pro Yakyuu '95 (Japan).desc: 嘿巴塔巴塔搖擺！您現在已加入虛擬大聯盟。與來自世界各地的 18 支球隊進行比賽。投擲快球、叉球、墜球、滑球和變速球。向柵欄揮桿，並打短打。操蒼蠅。阻礙驅動器。並給跑步者貼上標籤。一切盡在傳奇般的 3D 場景中。具有單場比賽、全明星賽和錦旗賽模式。請注意這一點：這是唯一一款足以在虛擬男孩棒球場上玩的棒球遊戲。所以不要丟球。挑選一名首發投手。設置你的DH。並走上盤子。

Waterworld (USA).name: 水世界
Waterworld (USA).original_desc:
THE DEACON AWAITS!

The Deacon will stop at nothing to control the world's most precious resource...

And he's turned his blood-thirsty Smokers loose on the Atoller civilization in a frantic search for Enola - the tattooed girl who holds the secret to Dryland. Only you can smoke the Smokers and deck the Deacon!

Waterworld brings your Virtual Boy screaming to life with incredibly smooth and realistic 3D animations, particle effects and texture mapped rendered graphics. So step into this action packed arcade experience today and learn what 3D gaming is all about.
Waterworld (USA).desc:
執事等待著！

執事將不惜一切代價控制世界上最寶貴的資源……

他讓嗜血的吸煙者們在阿托勒文明中瘋狂尋找伊諾拉——一個掌握著乾地秘密的紋身女孩。只有你才能熏煙者並裝飾執事者！

Waterworld 通過極其流暢和逼真的 3D 動畫、粒子效果和紋理映射渲染圖形，讓虛擬男孩的尖叫聲變得栩栩如生。因此，今天就進入這個動感十足的街機體驗，了解 3D 遊戲的全部內容。

Jack Bros. (USA).original_desc: Jack Bros., is an adventure video game released in 1995 on Virtual Boy. Once a year, at Halloween, the door between our country and the fairies opens. All fairy should return to Fairieland 23:00, otherwise, they will be banished forever. You must choose one of three Jack Bros. as your character. Each has its own attributes and weapons and special attacks.

Jack Bros. no Meiro de Hiihoo! (Japan).key: Jack Bros. no Meiro de Hiihoo! (Japan)
Jack Bros. no Meiro de Hiihoo! (Japan).original_name: Jack Bros. no Meiro de Hiihoo! (Japan)
Jack Bros. no Meiro de Hiihoo! (Japan).original_desc: Jack Bros., is an adventure video game released in 1995 on Virtual Boy. Once a year, at Halloween, the door between our country and the fairies opens. All fairy should return to Fairieland 23:00, otherwise, they will be banished forever. You must choose one of three Jack Bros. as your character. Each has its own attributes and weapons and special attacks.
